citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2pm-230pm
on 03-Oct-16.
Inspector made contact with a Park Associate. She informed the inspector that no one was available to complete a
full inspection.
